resources.string: Please enter the code you received

* Our minimum visiting charges mention in our app and web-site page. 

 * Please fix the rates with the services provider before the work is started.

 * We provide free after-services guarantee for a period 5 days(excluding faulty parts)

* We heard many people say that it is impossible to find a plumber electrician carpenter who is reliable and can do a quality job. This set us thinking why the current search directories dont work. 

 * The reasons were many: They were paid listings Reviews were fake not reliable And once we leave our contact number with search directories we would get a plethora of calls making my life hell. 

 * Moreover we still do not have a clue of which service provider to engage with as there is no guarantee of quality of work fair pricing and the provider coming on time to do the job.

 * This set us thinking, why this process has to be so painful. 

 * Why cant we buy local services the way we buy products from ecommerce sites on the click of a button Msure was conceived to solve precisely this pain area.


* Because we have 


* We aim to service all clients within in one working day 


* Qualified licence trade man fully insured and police check 


* Genuine warranty with reliable backup service 


* Very competitive pricing day or night 


* On time service 


* Compliance certificate for all kind of service work 


* Domestic and e-commerce service specialist 


* Experience is the difference
Book a service which you need
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
